about_the_game:
VRC XTREME Oval Track pack containing 3 spectacular oval lay-outs starting with XTREME BO1 (long) and MO1 (medium).

The XTREME track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTREME Oval Track pack will eventually contain 3 Oval Tracks, a long, medium and a short oval, to accommodate all classes of on-road oval racing. The short oval track XTR OT3 will be automatically added to this pack when it becomes available in 2024!
detailed_description:
VRC XTREME Oval Track pack containing 3 spectacular oval lay-outs starting with XTREME BO1 (long) and MO1 (medium).

The XTREME track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTREME Oval Track pack will eventually contain 3 Oval Tracks, a long, medium and a short oval, to accommodate all classes of on-road oval racing. The short oval track XTR OT3 will be automatically added to this pack when it becomes available in 2024!
